Module cz.cuni.mff.soukups3.VariantCaller
Package cz.cuni.mff.soukups3.VariantCaller

Record Class Read

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
cz.cuni.mff.soukups3.VariantCaller.Read
Record Components:
qname - Name of the read
flag - Flag info from the read
rname - Chromosome name
pos - Position inside of the chromosome (1-based)
mapq - Mapping quality
cigar - Cigar string
rnext - Next (pair) read's chromosome
pnext - Next (pair) read's position
tlen - Template length (length over reference)
seq - Sequence inside this read
qual - Per base quality
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public record Read(String qname, int flag, String rname, int pos, int mapq, Cigar cigar, String rnext, int pnext, int tlen, String seq, String qual) extends Record implements Serializable
Class managing one Read from the sam file.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.
